t: Amazon.com: Dynamic Color Tattoo Ink Set 12 Colors 1oz Size Colors OG Made in USA Set 2 : Beauty & Personal Care
s: 2nd set I've purchased, I am switching to Dynamic since I like the triple black so much. They are a little thin, but the color is vibrant and stays well. I would also recommend putting a small marble in the bottles too since they don't put anything in there to mix them. Luckily neither one of my sets were damaged in shipping like some of the other reviews. ... Came sealed . No leaks . Good ink ... The best brand ...
